lead_paragraph: Coach Jim Boeheim was greeted by a standing ovation and the No. 4 Orange defeated Eastern Michigan in their first game since assistant coach Bernie Fine was fired.
snippet: Coach Jim Boeheim was greeted by a standing ovation and the No. 4 Orange defeated Eastern Michigan in their first game since assistant coach Bernie Fine was fired.
